body_html: @ry recently added support for strides > filter, so if you use our nightly pip binaries or build from sources you should be able to do what you want! It will be part of our next official release if you want to just wait.
body_text: @ry recently added support for strides > filter, so if you use our nightly pip binaries or build from sources you should be able to do what you want!  It will be part of our next official release if you want to just wait.
body: @ry recently added support for strides > filter, so if you use our nightly pip binaries or build from sources you should be able to do what you want!  It will be part of our next official release if you want to just wait.
